brushes.command: fx br s 5 0.8 / ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 air > white_stained_glass ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 white_stained_glass > red_stained_glass
brushes.name: Bedrock -> Glass, 2 layers, size 5

brushes.command: fx br s 8 0.8 / ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 air > white_stained_glass ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 white_stained_glass > red_stained_glass
brushes.name: Bedrock -> Glass, 2 layers, size 8

brushes.command: fx br s 12 0.8 / ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 air > white_stained_glass ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 white_stained_glass > red_stained_glass
brushes.name: Bedrock -> Glass, 2 layers, size 12

brushes.command: fx br s 3 0.8 ? | white_stained_glass red_stained_glass ? at 0 1 0 air ? angle - 0 55 1 > sponge
brushes.name: Glass -> Floor, size 3

brushes.command: fx br s 6 0.8 ? | white_stained_glass red_stained_glass ? at 0 1 0 air ? angle - 0 55 1 > sponge
brushes.name: Glass -> Floor, size 6

brushes.command: fx br s 10 ? | white_stained_glass red_stained_glass ? ## simplex 3 120 3 > white_wool : > red_wool
brushes.name: Glass -> Simplex, 3d, scale 3

brushes.command: fx br s 10 ? | white_stained_glass red_stained_glass ? ## simplex 3 120 6 > white_wool : > red_wool
brushes.name: Glass -> Simplex, 3d, scale 6

brushes.command: fx br s 10 ? | white_stained_glass red_stained_glass ? ## simplex 4 120 3 > white_wool : > red_wool
brushes.name: Glass -> Simplex, 4d, scale 3

brushes.command: fx br s 10 ? | white_stained_glass red_stained_glass ? ## simplex 4 120 6 > white_wool : > red_wool
brushes.name: Glass -> Simplex, 4d, scale 6
